install.name: User - Contact Creator
install.author: Sam Moffatt
install.description: This plugin automatically creates contact entries for users and updates their details where relevant.

field.name: autowebpage
field.label: Automatic Webpage
field.description: A formatted string to automatically generate a contact's web page. [username] is replaced with the username, [userid] is replaced with the user ID and [email] is replaced with the user's email

field.name: category
field.label: Contact Default Category
field.description: The default category to put the user.

field.name: autopublish
field.label: Automaticly publish new contacts
field.description: Automatically publishes a contact when the contact is created. Modified contacts that are unpublished will not be published if this is enabled.
